commands.start: "Hello, {first_name}{last_name}ğŸ‘‹ Send me a photo of the suspicious area. I will analyze it and try to identify the presence of pathology.
commands.help: â” How to use the bot? â” Just send a photo of the suspicious area, and I will find all the moles (if they are clearly visible) and try to determine the presence of pathology. â“ How to take a photo for accurate analysis â“ Lighting: Use soft natural light. Avoid direct flash (it creates white highlights) and harsh shadows. Distance: Take the photo from 10-15 cm away. The mole should be in the center of the frame but not occupy it completely (I need to see some healthy skin around for comparison). Cleanliness: The skin should be clean, without plasters, markers, or bandages nearby.

commands.remove_connection: Connection name not specified. To remove a connection use: /removeconnection connection_name ğŸ“ Example: /removeconnection My_First_Connection
